title: Stranger (In Search of the Myreque)

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Stranger (In Search of the Myreque)
Stranger
Released10 January 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceWerewolf
LocationHair of the Dog Tavern
QuestIn Search of the Myreque
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineA typical villager of Canifis.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID5055

A character known only as Stranger can be found in the Hair of the Dog Tavern in Canifis. He can be found seated in a corner of the inn, and based on his facial features is a werewolf like the rest of the town's population.

Prior to completing In Search of the Myreque, the stranger's chair is occupied by Vanstrom Klause, a vampyre disguised as a human who is scouting the area for The Myreque organisation. At this point, the two appear identical in all but facial features, and only upon completing In Search of the Myreque will the Stranger replace Vanstrom. The two are so similar in appearance that, after completing the quest, the player will briefly mistake the Stranger for Vanstrom.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 January –
27 June 2005

The NPC's examine was changed from "A typical villager of Canafis."[sic] to "A typical villager of Canifis."

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
10 January 2005 –
21 March 2005 		21 March 2005 –
4 June 2007 		4 June 2007 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • After completing the quest, the stranger may revert back to the name and appearance of Vanstrom Klause. If they talk to him, he will turn back into the stranger, with his usual dialogue.
